author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Make global variables const, move them to anonymous namespace. Fixes workflow 10803.0 that fails in the latest IB (following the merge of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28813)
http://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/logreader/slc7_amd64_gcc820/CMSSW_11_1_X_2020-03-03-1100/pyRelValMatrixLogs/run/10803.0_SingleElectronPt1000+SingleElectronPt1000_pythia8_2018_GenSimFullINPUT+DigiFull_2018+RecoFull_2018+HARVESTFull_2018+ALCAFull_2018+NanoFull_2018/step3_SingleElectronPt1000+SingleElectronPt1000_pythia8_2018_GenSimFullINPUT+DigiFull_2018+RecoFull_2018+HARVESTFull_2018+ALCAFull_2018+NanoFull_2018.log

Made jointly with @Dr15Jones.

#### PR validation:

Workflow 10803.0 runs.
title: Fix thread safety issue in HLTBTagPerformanceAnalyzer
